title: 'Don't beat us, just shoot us': Kashmiris allege violent army crackdown
description: The BBC has heard allegations of violent beatings and even torture in Indian-administered Kashmir.

title: Colombia Farc rebels: President vows to hunt down new group
description: Iván Duque responds after former rebel commanders call on followers to take up arms once more.

title: Hurricane Dorian: 'Extremely dangerous' storm bears down on Florida
description: President Trump cancels a trip to Poland as Hurricane Dorian nears, saying it could be "very big".

title: Measles: Four European nations lose eradication status
description: The World Health Organization blames misinformation for the global resurgence of the disease.

title: Spain ex-manager's daughter dies aged nine
description: Former Spain and Barcelona manager Luis Enrique pays tribute to his daughter after she died from bone cancer aged nine.

title: Denver lawsuit alleges woman had to give birth alone in jail cell
description: The woman says she suffered "terror, pain and humiliation" as jail staff ignored her pleas for help.

title: Mystery of Napoleon's favourite general may be solved in Russian discovery
description: DNA results on remains found under a dance floor in Russia could end the mystery of a French general.

title: Ilhan Omar reveals racist threat to shoot her at state fair
description: Ilhan Omar speaks out as an Alabama Republican says she should "go back to Somalia".

title: FBI's James Comey spared prosecution over Trump memo leak
description: But an internal watchdog says the former FBI director failed to safeguard sensitive information.

title: US hospital 'forced' Catholic nurse to assist with abortion
description: The Trump administration says the Catholic nurse objected on religious grounds but was ignored.

title: Trump statue erected in Melania's home country Slovenia
description: The wooden monument follows a statue of his wife that drew comparisons to a Smurfette.

title: Anti-groping stamp lets victims mark assailants
description: The Japanese device is paired with a special lamp that lets its otherwise invisible ink be seen.

title: Reham Saeed: TV host suspended over obesity comments
description: The TV host said that overweight women are "a burden on their families and the state".

title: Elon Musk and Jack Ma disagree about AI's threat
description: The two tech entrepreneurs debated the risks posed by artificial intelligence at an event in Shanghai.

title: Celebrating Islam in predominantly Catholic Mexico
description: For decades, hundreds of Muslims have been forging their own identity in predominantly Catholic southern Mexico.

title: The men who feel left out of US abortion debate
description: Discussion in the US hinges on the rights of the mother and foetus but rarely the would-be fathers.

title: Ukraine's deadliest day: The battle of Ilovaisk, August 2014
description: Some 400 troops died at Ilovaisk in 2014 when Ukrainian forces retreated through a "safe" corridor.

title: TM30: The form getting expats in Thailand into a bureaucratic tangle
description: Foreign workers now have to check in with officials every time they leave home for more than a day.

title: Letter from Africa: Nigerian anger over South African xenophobia
description: Anti-foreigner attacks in South Africa are souring the country's relations with Nigeria.

title: How do blind people enjoy the Mona Lisa?
description: Museums don't allow people to touch the Mona Lisa or any Van Gogh paintings. With tactile art now you can.

title: Former Brazilian president speaks exclusively to the BBC from prison
description: Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva criticised the current president's handling of the Amazon fires.

title: Hong Kong park lights up in sex abuse protest
description: Thousands showed up to support protesters who say they were sexually assaulted by the police.

title: Franklin Expedition: New footage of wreck of HMS Terror
description: Researchers in Canada have been exploring HMS Terror from the ill-fated Franklin Expedition.

title: Giant smoke plume as Italy's Stromboli volcano erupts
description: No injuries have been reported but planes have been deployed to drop water on fires caused by lava.

title: Gaming faces its #MeToo moment
description: Several game developers have accused colleagues and peers of sexual assault.

title: Amazon fires: Forest loss challenges Paris climate ambition
description: Fossil fuel burning is the big issue but continued forest cover loss will make climate targets harder to achieve, say scientists.

title: Sudan's revolutionaries pin hopes on PM Abdalla Hamdok
description: The junta has agreed to a civilian government after months of protests against its rule.

title: Obituary: Volkswagen's visionary leader Ferdinand Piëch
description: Volkswagen became a global giant under tough perfectionist Ferdinand Piëch, who has died at 82.

title: Amazon fires: What about Bolivia?
description: The world has been gripped by the burning of the Brazilian Amazon - but it's aflame in Bolivia, too.
